talk.author: did:plc:ttgq4zaqpfzvhdf25r2cctlw
talk.utter: My library also offers the Hoopla collection of e books and audiobooks. They often have books my library system doesn’t.

talk.author: did:plc:vhfyuuqsbirih5p6ubper3zx
talk.utter: My only beef with it is that my local is a small library so the selection is not large. I want to hook up to larger libraries.

talk.author: did:plc:vhfyuuqsbirih5p6ubper3zx
talk.utter: Gonna need your library so i can get that free online card :)

talk.author: did:plc:m77ofhucwfntfbrx3d6rjdms
talk.utter: I’m not a weirdo, but maybe friend me so I can DM a link to my library? I just don’t plan to publicly identify where I’m at!
